lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Jeffrey. You were a warm and generous father, a doting partner and a devoted brother. You loved and encouraged us without exception; we adored and admired you without equal. We hold you close in our hearts, today and always. David, Deborah, Nancy, Charles and their families 1/3
